      • getSkull

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getSkull(String uri)
                                               throws NoSuchFieldException,
                                                      SecurityException,
                                                      IllegalArgumentException,
                                                      IllegalAccessException
        Load skin into a skull item stack
        Parameters:
        uri - the url, eg: "http://textures.minecraft.net/texture/e58c3ff46ac3fa1a408b24e5b99913cb4c116d8ad7b259186c9fd529464a71c"
        Returns:
        the item stack
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - bad version (not 1.9.2-4)
        SecurityException - LET ME DO STUFF
        IllegalArgumentException - shouldnt happen
        IllegalAccessException - not good
